actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to authorize medicare or medicaid patients individually or as a class to bring suit for specific performance in Federal district court against a long-term care facility which is in violation of its provider agreement.

summary.text: Authorizes medicare or medicaid patients individually or as a class to bring suit under the Social Security Act for specific performance without regard to the $10,000 jurisdictional amount, in Federal district court aginst a long-term care facility which is in violation of its provider agreement.

titles.title: A bill to authorize medicare or medicaid patients individually or as a class to bring suit for specific performance in Federal district court against a long-term care facility which is in violation of its provider agreement.
